content: you can now have garden gnomes in your house on your keys on your christmas tree or literally anywhere these little creatures of stone now turned yarn have a small patch of moss on the back of their cloaks from sitting in the yarn drawer for too long they work with any type of yarn you have and only use a small amount if you are using a finer yarn i use dk you will need to use beads or do some embroidery for the eyes the smallest safety eyes will work for worsted weight and above **materials ** ---------- -yarn of your choice in the following colours *-grey -green or another colour -brown optional -white or cream optional * -hook that works well with your yarn weight -safety eyes or beads -tapestry needle -scissors -stuffing
